title: Carrot and Zucchini Fettuccine with Peanuts with Yummi Nuts Japanese Peanut
ingredients: 1 clove of garlic cut in half
1 bag of Yummi Nuts Japanese Peanuts
instructions: Step 1: Peel the carrot and zucchini. With the same peeler, cut long strips or "noodles" of both vegetables, making sure they are more or less the same size.
Step 2: Place the steamer basket in a pot and pour enough water leaving Â½ finger between the water and the basket, add the salt.
Step 3: Place the carrot and zucchini on top of the basket, put the pot on the burner over medium heat, cover, and cook for 3 minutes.
Step 4: Heat the oil in a nonstick skillet and brown the garlic over medium heat, pressing it against the pan to release its juices for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and discard.
Step 5: Add the "noodles" and brown for 2 minutes; Add tomato sauce, cheese, and peanuts and serve.
